00001 ///@file CustomSSLCert.c
00002 ///@brief SSL Certificate
00003 
00004 /*********************************************************************
00005  *
00006  *      RSA Public Key Encryption Library Data Storage
00007  *  Library for Microchip TCP/IP Stack
00008  *       - Initializes a sample RSA Key and Certificate for use over SSL

00062 #if defined(STACK_USE_SSL_SERVER)
00063 
00064 // This must remain commented for now to prevent a C18 bug from
00065 // ignoring the initialization routine.  Unfortunately, that means
00066 // we cannot safely update SSL certificates at run time - they 
00067 // must be compiled in for now.
00068 //#pragma romdata ssldata
00069 
00070 // These must all be in little endian byte order, not network byte 
00071 // order (big endian)
00072 ROM BYTE SSL_P[] = {
00073         0xF7, 0x1D, 0x08, 0xE4, 0xA2, 0xDF, 0xB5, 0x33,
00074         0x02, 0xAB, 0x6F, 0xDB, 0x5B, 0x3E, 0x5E, 0x91,

00076         0xCD, 0x9F, 0x02, 0x80, 0x67, 0x56, 0x77, 0xD7
00077 }; 
00078
